mapper.select: SELECT no, title, writer, content, reg_date AS regDate, read_count AS readCount, pass, file1 FROM memo ORDER BY no DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memo(title, writer, content, reg_date, read_count, pass, file1) VALUES(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, SYSDATE(), #{readCount}, #{pass}, #{file1})
